title: Advanced Mathematics Problem-Solving Course for Healthcare Professionals Using Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and practical experience in specialized fields (medical/technical)
context.additional_context: Practice-centered blended learning environment with digital device support and specialized custom learning scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners apply advanced mathematical modeling techniques required for analyzing complex medical data using an intelligent tutoring system.
Learners document the process of solving mathematical problems encountered in real job situations through project-based assignments.
Learners revise and improve problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy through peer assessment and system feedback.

resources: Real-World Case Database in Medical/Technical Fields

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
